tmpl.text: Founded The Carnegie United Kingdom Trust to address the changing needs of the people of the United Kingdom and Ireland.

name: Layout 1
comments: This should be using the layout1 class. Short header, small body copy on the left and a big ass image to the right

tmpl.subhead: The Carnegie UK Trust is an independent, endowed charitable trust incorporated by a Royal Charter. The Trust is one of over twenty foundations established by Andrew Carnegie.

name: Layout 2
comments: This should be using the layout2 class. Covering background image with big header text
